name: 3d Collectathon
description:
Discord Server

THIS IS STILL A WORK IN PROGRESS. THIS IS A SUUUUUUPER EARLY BUILD!

There's not much to the game yet. There are bugs.

Combat is not yet implemented. Enemies will circle you when they get close.

I'm not crazy about the camera system currently. It'll change.

CONTROLS

Keyboard + Mouse:

  • WASD = Move
  • Mouse = Controls camera
  • Space = Jump / Interact
  • Left Mouse Button = Attack (animation currently, doesn't do damage)
  • Middle Mouse Button = Resets camera behind player
  • Control = Crouches (Control then Jump gives a higher jump)
  • Escape = Menu
  • F5 = Restarts level
  • Page up/down = Increase/decrease max health
  • Plus/Minus = Increase current health
  • F1 = Close/open debug info

Controller:

  • Left stick = Move
  • Right stick = Controls camera
  • Press right stick = Resets camera behind player
  • RB / R1 = Resets camera behind player
  • LT / L2 - Crouches (Crouch then Jump gives a higher jump)
  • Bottom Face Button (A on Xbox, X on Playstation) = Jump / Interact
  • Left Face Button (X on Xbox, Square on Playstation) = Attack (animation currently, doesn't do damage)
  • Start = Menu
  • Select = Restarts level

I have provided a Mac version, but I have not tested it out yet. That's probably got more bugs than the Windows version!
